short.zh_CN: FeitaAsst - 拦截有风险的域名

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FeitaAsst - Real-time security protection
Strive to protect privacy
FeitaAsst strictly follows the chrome privacy specification, and does not collect or use any user's browsing data, submission data, identity data, location information and other privacy, and users can use it with confidence. Real-time security protection
Using FeitaAsst protection will help users to check the safety of visiting websites in a timely manner, just like having an information security expert by their side, protecting users from scams, viruses and phishing websites. FeitaAsst warns users when they visit dangerous sites such as scams, malware, phishing sites, malicious web stores and other dangerous links. FeitaAsst clearly indicates risks, and users can go to the website to view the details.
Easy to operate
FeitaAsst provides two modes: manual and automatic protection. When automatic protection is turned on, it will help users to check the access address and prompt risks in real time. Users can also select the address and use the right-click menu to manually check whether the website is safe.
Security research expert team
Use FeitaAsst to escort users online. We have a professional team of network security research experts and maintain a library of tens of thousands of malicious websites.
 Free to use
FeitaAsst will be free forever. After users download the software from the app store for free, choose to load and start it in the browser plug-in management.

We strive to maintain network security and strive to create a "world without thieves" network environment. If you need our support and help, please contact: hello@feita.xyz
long.zh_CN:
FeitaAsst - 实时安全防护
努力保护隐私
FeitaAsst严格遵循chrome隐私规范，不收集或使用任何用户的浏览数据、提交数据、身份数据、位置信息等隐私，用户可以放心使用。实时安全防护
使用FeitaAsst防护将帮助用户及时检查访问网站的安全性，就像身边有信息安全专家一样，保护用户免受诈骗、病毒和钓鱼网站的侵害。当用户访问诸如诈骗、恶意软件、网络钓鱼网站、恶意网络商店和其他危险链接等危险网站时，FeitaAsst 会发出警告。 FeitaAsst明确指出风险，用户可前往网站查看详情。
易于操作
FeitaAsst 提供手动保护和自动保护两种模式。开启自动防护后，将帮助用户查看访问地址，实时提示风险。用户还可以选择地址并使用右键菜单手动检查网站是否安全。
安全研究专家团队
使用FeitaAsst为用户在线保驾护航。我们拥有专业的网络安全研究专家团队，维护着上万个恶意网站库。
 免费使用
FeitaAsst 将永远免费。用户从应用商店免费下载软件后，在浏览器插件管理中选择加载并启动。

我们努力维护网络安全，努力营造“天下无贼”的网络环境。如果您需要我们的支持和帮助，请联系：hello@feita.xyz
